short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A tool that converts your Upwork work history into a visually appealing image for better proposals.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
If you are a freelancer on Upwork and struggling to create impressive proposals, then this tool is designed for you. It can help you create an eye-catching visual from your Upwork work history to attract clients. The process is straightforward and can be completed in three simple steps:

1. Log in to Upwork as a freelancer and go to Deliver Work > Client History > Select a Project > Go to the Details tab.
2. Click on the Upwork Contract Exporter icon.
3. Finally, select "Export" and you are done.

This tool is completely free of charge. If you have any contributions, feedback, or feature requests, please do not hesitate to contact me.
